name: Doodle life
description:
You play as doodly. Doodly is in a hurry and needs to get to the door. He doesn't why he's busy, he's just busy. For that, you need to create the right path for Doodly in order for him to get to the door. 

(Click the fullscreen button at the right bottom side of the game window in order to see the entire game window)

Left Mouse Click - Create path for Doodly.
